did.unittitle: Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs

physdesc.extent: two items housed in one folder and one oversize flat file drawer.

did.abstract: The Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs contains two photographic prints showing views of Coney Island, circa 1930. One photograph is a 5 x 7 inch black-and-white informal group portrait showing two unidentified men seated in a two-person ride. The second photograph is an oversized black-and-white panoramic view showing swimmers in a pool at Steeplechase Park.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Leo Wollman collection of Coney Island photographs contains two photographic prints showing views of Coney Island, circa 1930. One photograph is a 5 x 7 inch black-and-white informal group portrait showing two unidentified men seated in a two-person ride. The second photograph is an oversized black-and-white panoramic view showing swimmers in a pool at Steeplechase Park.
